item.title: 7 Best Smart Locks (2026) for Front Doors, Side Doors, and Even Garages
item.description: Upgrade your locks with fingerprint-scanning or a keypad, whether it’s at the front door or a sliding glass entryway.

item.title: Google Acquires Top Talent From AI Voice Startup Hume AI in Licensing Deal
item.description: Hume AI’s CEO, Alan Cowen, will join Google DeepMind along with several top engineers as part of a major licensing deal.

item.title: A Wikipedia Group Made a Guide to Detect AI Writing. Now a Plug-In Uses It to ‘Humanize’ Chatbots
item.description: The web’s best resource for spotting AI writing has ironically become a manual for AI models to hide it.

item.title: How to Meditate (Without an Om in Sight) (2026)
item.description: There’s no need for an expensive retreat to practice meditation. Try it on your lunch break to recharge your mind and body.

item.title: The US Is In For Another Bad Year of Measles Cases
item.description: A growing measles outbreak in South Carolina has infected more than 600 people since October, with hundreds more being potentially exposed.
